classification.task_goal: Generate a dark science fiction story set in a colony outpost on Mars, focusing on psychological drama and character development.
primary_constraints: The story must not include aliens.
The setting is a colony outpost on Mars.
The narrative should involve problems and shortages of food and supplies.
classification.reasoning: The user explicitly changed the direction of the story multiple times, introducing new elements and scenarios while maintaining the core theme of the narrative. This indicates a valid adaptation of the task rather than a collapse or drift.
